description: Shopee Open Platform documentation page introducing the platform and its capabilities

main_sections.title: What is Shopee Open Platform?
main_sections.description: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services

main_sections.title: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
main_sections.description: Shopee Open API provides sellers with quick and easy access to important shop data for selling on Shopee. This includes information for product, order, and campaign management, amongst others.

main_sections.title: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?
main_sections.description: Platform caters to 2 types of developers: software service providers and sellers with software development capabilities

key_features: Powerful APIs for orders, products, marketing

notes: This appears to be the main introduction page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation. It contains no specific API endpoint information but provides an overview of the platform's capabilities and features. The page shows a navigation menu on the left with various sections including Getting Started, API Best Practices, and various integration guides.
